## deleteUserNotifications variable

Function that deletes user notifications If notificationIds is not passed, all the notifications of the user are deleted

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteUserNotifications: (userId: Types.ObjectId, notificationIds?: Types.ObjectId[]) => Promise<void>
```
